title: Romantic Rose Gins - The Glendalough Rose Gin is Excellent for Valentine's Day Celebrations (TrendHunter.com)
text:
The Glendalough Rose Gin combines the essence of romance and botanical craftsmanship in just one product.
The Glendalough Rose Gin is intensely floral, bringing together rose flowers sourced from an Irish garden, wild roses, and Wicklow mountain botanicals. The use of fresh roses from the Distiller Ciar√°n (Rowdy) Rooney's late mother's garden adds a sentimental touch to the gin-making process, suggesting a unique and heartfelt approach.
Ahead of Valentine's Day, Glendalough suggests a range of cocktails for consumers to enjoy its Rose Gin. The Glendalough Rose Martini and the Rose and Raspberry Fizz are two examples that offer creative ways to indulge in the gin while also exhibiting the product's versatility.
Retailing at $34.99, the Glendalough Rose Gin is on the affordable side of spirits which will also capture consumer attention.
